column4: hi there, i got a problem. i reinstalled hardy over gutsy today. and know i got a weird behaviour with maximized windows (compiz is enabled): every maximized and focused window randomly restores and maximizes again after almost each click in that window... result is a complete weirdness with constantly "moving" windows
try disabling compiz then reenabling it
i killed compiz and started it again, no change
no, i got a crash instead
i clicked on a channel in konversation when suddenly the login screen appeared...
i dont think that had anything to do with what we were doing..
me neither. i'm trying to ignore it :)
did u get my msg when i said try restarting X?
no, i could test that now
